Installation¶

To install CHAP, you can either:

  • follow the guide to Manual Installation Environment in Python (TODO: version) or

  • as recommended, install in a containerized envorinment

Manual Installation Environment in Python (TODO: version)¶

External Dependencies¶

  • CHAP is written using Python (TODO: version) or above

If you have set up your environment manually (bullet one), you are ready to execute CHAP via the command line using the entrypoint script within the directory associated with the CHAP Github repository. The command-line options for CHAP are documented in the Usage Notes section.

CHAP conforms to the BIDS recommended user interface formatting, specifically: ::$ python entrypoint_script.py <input_bids_path> <derivatives_path> <analysis_level> <named_options> (TODO: check if this is correct)
